name: Rocket Rush (itch) (Two Flying Cats)
description:
Jump as high as you can, but look out: once New Year starts, fireworks will launch from below and destroy your platforms!

Note: may take a while to load due to game size and does not support mobile (yet!)

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam #181: Countdown to New Year.

Controls:

  • A/D or left/right arrows: move left/right
  • W or spacebar: jump
  • Enter: quick start/restart

Acknowledgments:

  • All graphics by Avui
  • Music by James Hammond
  • Fireworks sounds taken from Zapsplat
  • Font by NJ Studios
